body_html:
The mirroring will need to be updated by whoever has the perms for that, I already added the URL:
"https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/google/nsync/archive/1.20.1.tar.gz"
should point to: "https://github.com/google/nsync/archive/1.20.1.tar.gz",

@gunan can you trigger the tests so the windows CMake build runs, thats the most important bit :)

body:
The mirroring will need to be updated by whoever has the perms for that, I already added the URL:
"https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/google/nsync/archive/1.20.1.tar.gz"
should point to: "https://github.com/google/nsync/archive/1.20.1.tar.gz",

@gunan can you trigger the tests so the windows CMake build runs, thats the most important bit :)
